divs: Sighting DetailsWe Were standing on my neighbors porch and I noticed behind the clouds what Ithought was possibly the moon - but it didnt look right. The clouds passed andThere was a glowing object that I jokingly said looked like the Bat signal butit was more like a butterfly. It pulsed somewhat in we 4, spoke of. It slowlydrifted NE and began to dissapate but still glowed. It looked to me that therewas one area to the left of the object - One small area that flashed a few times- although it may have been my eyes playing tricks from staring at it.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Hampton
